name: ORCSNET from IndiTip
author: IndiTip

sections.description: ORCSNET is an India-only service which lets people pay voluntary royalties or donations for web content.
sections.installation:
Installing “ORCSNET from IndiTip” can be done either by searching for “ORCSNET from IndiTip” via the “Plugins > Add New” screen in your WordPress dashboard, or by using the following steps:

  1. Download the plugin via WordPress.org
  2. Upload the ZIP file through the ‘Plugins > Add New > Upload’ screen in your WordPress dashboard
  3. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
sections.faq:
What is my userid?

Your userid is assigned by IndiTip when you create an Orcsnet account. Email us to get started: support@orcsnet.com

Can I place the plugin somewhere else on my blog?

Yes, by using the [orc] shortcode.

Can my international readers pay me?

IndiTip only processes domestic (INR) transactions at this time.

short_description: This plugin inserts an ORCSNET collector into your WordPress posts.
description: ORCSNET is an India-only service which lets people pay voluntary royalties or donations for web content.
